com.paydiant.android.core.service

Interface IGiftAccountManagerService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GiftAccountManagerService

    public interface IGiftAccountManagerService
    The Interface defining operations related to gift accounts.

    Warning: DO NOT reference the core.service package classes directly as these are missing the required business functionalities. Use core.facade or ui.service classes instead.

    Since:
    4.1.0.1
    Author:
    Paydiant Inc.
    See Also:
    IGiftAccountManagerService

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LoadPaymentAccountResponse loadPaymentInstrument(LoadPaymentAccountParameters loadPaymentAccountParameters)
      Provides the facility to load/reload funds to a payment account.
      List<LoadConfiguration> retrieveLoadConfiguration(LoadSpecificationParameters loadSpecificationParameters)
      Retrieve load configuration.

    • Method Detail

      • retrieveLoadConfiguration

        List<LoadConfiguration> retrieveLoadConfiguration(LoadSpecificationParameters loadSpecificationParameters)
        Retrieve load configuration. Passing null values for both LoadSpecificationParameters.setPaymentAccountType(com.paydiant.android.core.domain.transactionflow.PaymentAccountType) and LoadSpecificationParameters.setPaymentAccountNetworkType(com.paydiant.android.core.domain.transactionflow.PaymentAccountNetworkType) will return all the LoadConfigurations.
        Parameters:
        loadSpecificationParameters - the load specification parameters
        Returns:
        specific or all load configurations depending on the loadSpecificationParameters
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - in case of an error occurs, PaydiantException or one of its subclasses with the following status codes will be thrown.

        400 (BAD_REQUEST) - Invalid arguments.
        500 (INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR) - Internal server error occurred.

      • loadPaymentInstrument

        LoadPaymentAccountResponse loadPaymentInstrument(LoadPaymentAccountParameters loadPaymentAccountParameters)
        Provides the facility to load/reload funds to a payment account. This also provides support to provision a payment account and load funds.
        1. If the loadPaymentAccountParameters parameter instance's LoadPaymentAccountParameters.getLoadingAccount() is populated with ProvisionCard.getPaymentAccountType(), ProvisionCard.getPaymentAccountNetworkType() and ProvisionCard.getAdditionalData() and without any values assigned for ProvisionCard.getPaymentAccountUri(), a new payment instrument would be provisioned and loaded with the specified amounts.
        2. If the loadPaymentAccountParameters parameter instance contains ProvisionCard.getPaymentAccountUri() value, then the specified amount will be loaded/reloaded to an existing account.
        Parameters:
        loadPaymentAccountParameters - parameters required to load, reload or provision payment accounts with funds.
        Returns:
        the details of the loaded/reloaded or provisioned payment account.
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - in case of an error occurs, PaydiantException or one of its subclasses with the following status codes will be thrown.

        400 (BAD_REQUEST) - Invalid arguments.
        409 (CONFLICT) - Card provisioning limit exceeded.
        410 (GONE) - Invalid amount.
        414 (REQUEST_URI_TOO_LONG) - Add value failed.
        420 (METHOD_FAILURE) - Maximum balance exceeded.
        421 (DESTINATION_LOCKED) - Maximum add value exceeded.
        426 (UPGRADE_REQUIRED) - Add value not supported.
        500 (INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR) - Internal Server Error.
        501 (NOT_IMPLEMENTED) - Processing error.
        Since:
        4.7.0.1
